macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: U.S. stocks tick higher; S&P 500 hits all-time high on holiday-shortened session
items.summary: Major U.S. indexes rose in the holiday-shortened session as the S&P 500 closed at a fresh record, the Dow gained about 0.6%, and the Nasdaq eked out a modest advance amid light volumes and ongoing Santa Claus–rally flows.[1][3]

items.title: S&P 500 closes at 6,932.05; Nasdaq at 23,613.31, Russell 2000 also higher
items.summary: The S&P 500 rose 0.32% to 6,932.05, the Nasdaq Composite gained 0.22% to 23,613.31, the Dow climbed roughly 0.6% to 48,731.16, and the Russell 2000 added about 0.27% as U.S. equities extended a multi‑day rally on light holiday trading volumes.[1][3]

items.title: VIX, volumes fall as Santa Claus rally momentum continues
items.summary: Volatility measures fell and trading volumes were light as the S&P 500 recorded several consecutive days of gains consistent with a typical year‑end 'Santa Claus' rally that historically shows positive returns over the last five trading days of the year plus the first two of the next year.[2]

items.title: Labor data and Fed policy remain investor focus ahead of year‑end
items.summary: With stocks rallying, investors continued to weigh U.S. labor data and the Federal Reserve's interest-rate outlook as key drivers for market direction into year end.[3]

items.title: Dynavax soars after Sanofi announces acquisition
items.summary: Dynavax Technologies jumped sharply after French drugmaker Sanofi said it would acquire the vaccine company, a move that drove one of the session's notable individual stock gains.[3]

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Circle Warns of Fake Tokenized Gold and Silver Swaps Platform
items.summary: Circle stated that a platform promising tokenized gold and silver swaps on its network is fraudulent. This alert comes amid ongoing interest in Circle's USDC and new products like StableFX for onchain currency trading.

items.title: Ark Invest Purchases $9.1M in Circle and Bullish Shares Amid Crypto Stock Slide
items.summary: Ark Invest bought $7.6M in Circle and $1.5M in Bullish on Nov. 25 as stocks declined with BTC around $87,500. Separately, Ark added $30.5M in Circle shares across ETFs as the stock fell 12%.

items.title: Circle Reports Q3 Profit Triples on USDC Growth, Beats Estimates
items.summary: Circle's third-quarter profit tripled due to USDC expansion, exceeding forecasts despite share slide from expected lower U.S. interest rates. William Blair reiterates outperform rating on USDC dominance.

items.title: Circle Launches Arc Blockchain Testnet with Major Institutions Including BlackRock and Visa
items.summary: Circle began public testing of its Arc blockchain, attracting BlackRock, HSBC, Visa, AWS, and Anthropic. ClearBank also joined Circle's payments network for MiCA-compliant USDC and EURC in Europe.

items.title: Aave Token Drops 20% After Governance Vote Exposes DAO and Labs Rift
items.summary: Aave's token slid 20% following a rushed governance vote on brand control, highlighting tensions between the DAO and Aave Labs.

items.title: Do Kwon Pleads Guilty to Fraud in Terra-Luna Case, Faces Up to 12 Years
items.summary: Do Kwon admitted to two counts of fraud related to Terraform Labs, agreeing to forfeit $19M under a plea deal.

items.title: Kyrgyzstan Launches KGST Stablecoin Pegged to Som on Binance
items.summary: Kyrgyzstan introduced the som-pegged KGST stablecoin and a USD-pegged variant on Binance to support local digital asset use.

items.title: HTX and TRON Ecosystem Launch 200,000 USDT Year-End Airdrop Carnival
items.summary: HTX started a year-end event from Dec 22, 2025, to Jan 18, 2026, with 200,000 USDT prizes in partnership with TRON projects like SunPump and BitTorrent, featuring trading incentives.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Epic Online Services outage knocks Fortnite, Rocket League, Fall Guys offline during holiday play
items.summary: Players reported widespread login and matchmaking failures for Fortnite, Rocket League and other Epic-linked games after an Epic Online Services authentication failure that began December 24 and persisted into December 25, 2025, disrupting Winterfest activity and cross‑platform play worldwide.

items.title: Rocket League suffers massive connection issues on Christmas as Psyonix investigates
items.summary: Rocket League experienced major outages affecting logins and matchmaking across PC and consoles on December 24–25, 2025; Psyonix and Epic pointed to EOS authentication problems and advised players that engineering teams were working on restorations.

items.title: Community reporting and guides respond to Fortnite holiday downtime
items.summary: As Fortnite players faced authentication errors during Winterfest 2025, coverage and community posts summarized the outage causes (server overload + EOS issues), noted Epic's status updates, and explained that usual client-side troubleshooting would not resolve the problem.

items.title: Holiday streaming roundups and community events continue despite outages
items.summary: Stream schedules and community posts highlighted planned holiday streams and content (e.g., Frostfall/Cloudheim streams and Christmas gaming specials), with some creators pivoting away from affected live services to offline games and retro content.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
